metadata.description: Spells that create, enhance, and manipulate magical power and effects

spells.name: Aegis of the Hearth
spells.description: Creates a magical barrier around a covenant or dwelling that repels supernatural creatures and hostile magic. The barrier is invisible but potent.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (create magical protection), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +4 Boundary, +1 for power

spells.name: Parma Magica
spells.description: Creates a personal magical resistance that protects against hostile spells and magical effects. The protection is selective and controlled.

spells.name: Gift of Vigor
spells.description: Restores magical energy to a tired magus, allowing them to cast more spells. The target regains fatigue levels as if they had rested.

spells.name: Wizard's Communion
spells.description: Allows multiple magi to combine their magical power for a single spell. The participants must be willing and coordinated.

spells.name: Create Vis
spells.description: Creates a small amount of raw vis of any Art. The vis is real and permanent, but creating it is extremely difficult.

spells.name: Enhance the Mystical Connection
spells.description: Strengthens an arcane connection, making it more powerful and extending its useful life. The connection becomes harder to sever.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (enhance connection), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for strengthening

spells.name: Aura of Magical Might
spells.description: Surrounds the target with visible magical energy that enhances their spellcasting ability and intimidates enemies. Provides bonus to magical activities.

spells.name: Ward Against Faeries
spells.description: Creates a magical barrier that prevents faeries from entering the protected area. The ward is invisible but effective.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (ward against supernatural), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +2 Room

spells.name: Fountain of Magical Energy
spells.description: Creates a permanent source of magical energy that provides a constant moderate magical aura. The fountain enhances magical activities in the area.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (create magical source), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +2 for permanence

spells.name: Bind the Hostile Magic
spells.description: Creates magical bonds that can capture and hold hostile spells or magical effects, preventing them from affecting their intended targets.
